-- | Orphan instances of MonadBase and MonadBaseControl for SpecM
--   
@package hspec-monad-control
@version 0.1.0.0

module Test.Hspec.Control
instance MonadBaseControl IO (SpecM a)
instance MonadBase IO (SpecM a)
